item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: Bunnyhopping? Is this where the guy stands with feet on pedals, bike stationary, and jumps up and down? This is such a BOY thing. Would you ever see a girl bouncing up and down on a bike? Isn't this the wrong direction? We would more likely be twining pretty flowers in the spokes.
item.content:encoded: Bunnyhopping? Is this where the guy stands with feet on pedals, bike stationary, and jumps up and down? This is such a BOY thing. Would you ever see a girl bouncing up and down on a bike? Isn’t this the wrong direction? We would more likely be twining pretty flowers in the spokes.
